summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transactions for an account held at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It details the beginning and ending balances for April 2014, including deposits, withdrawals, and service charges. The document is marked confidential and includes instructions for reporting errors in account statements.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $500,629.96 on April 1, 2014.
A transfer of funds amounting to $500,629.96 was recorded on April 8, 2014.
The ending balance as of April 30, 2014, was $50.00.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in account statements within 60 days.
The document is marked confidential and is subject to Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure.
